name: WALNUTI - 4" Wood Designer Toy
description: Hell hell hell.... No nut stays uncracked when he comes!!! :D walnut wood & brass / high-gloss finish handcrafted, signed & numbered by pepe comes shipped in a custom box available next week! :) more images here on flickr: www.flickr.com/smallstuffstudio and visit my blog to be up to date :) www.smallstuff.ch

name: HEARTWOODS - 3.5" Wood Toy by pepe (No.12/24 & No.13/24)
description: HEARTWOODS - 3.5" Wood Toys by pepe for Andy Heng from TOYSREVIL First Edition | 12 Maple & 12 Walnut RELEASE - Monday, November 22th (Central European Time CET - 18:00) - all crafted out of maple & walnut wood - each comes with a little brass birdie on top - iron-branding on backside with artist signatur - numbered by embossing on the bottom - these fellas have a linseed oil finish all proceeds of this sale will be donated to Andy "TOYSREVIL" Heng, a leading voice and supporter of the Toy Art community, who has recently been hospitalized and is in recovery. read more here! as a small token of our appreciation for your help you will get a brass birdie pendant and a small surprise with your order for free! :) get to know more about HEARTWOODS here! & check the WIP sneak peek pictures of how your HEARTWOOD Wood Toy was made here!

name: PEARGIR - 4" Wood Designer Toy
description: PEARGIR - 4" Wooden Designer Toy (No.01) Swiss Wooden Designer Toy designed & crafted by pepe This tiny fella is made out of pear- and maplewood, has a high-gloss finish and comes with a handmade foam box for safety transportation. more images here on my flickr: www.flickr.com/smallstuffstudio or visit my blog to get to know more about PEARGIR :) www.smallstuff.ch

name: ARBOROBOTS "Ramble & Roam" - Cris Rose X Pepe
description: Designed in London, hand crafted in Zurich, Arborobots are the result of a colaboration by Cris Rose and Pepe â€“ solid wooden bots that are happy to help. Limited First Edition | 5 Pairs of "Ramble & Roam" -------------------------------------------------- RELEASE - Thursday, July 7th (Central European Time CET - 20:00) -------------------------------------------------- Made from Walnut, Maple and Brass, these chaps are very limited. Ramble is the larger character, a robot grown from wood that feels he is missing something in his big hollow tummy. Coming in single and two-eyed variants, he has thoughts on what he might desire and looks to seek them out. Roam is the smaller chap, keen to help out and particularly good at finding lost things. With one big brass eye, he holds his find aloft and shuffles along as quickly as he can manage.

name: OCCTOBBOBBA - 4.5" Resin Weeble by Pepe (red)
description: Limited First Edition | 5 Handcasted & Handpainted Resin Toys -------------------------------------------------- RELEASE - Monday, April 18th (Central European Time CET - 19:00) -------------------------------------------------- more about the OCCTOBOBBA's here!
